#labels Featured
== Introduction ==

OSGi MonitorAdmin Implementation. 

== Details ==

Specification reference: [http://www.osgi.org/Download/File?url=/download/r4v42/r4.cmpn.pdf OSGi Service Platform Service Compendium 4.2 - 119 Monitor Admin Service Specification].

API JavaDoc reference: [http://www.osgi.org/javadoc/r4v42/org/osgi/service/monitor/package-summary.html Here].
 

Current version: *1.0.2* (20100728)

Bundle download: [http://osgilab.googlecode.com/files/monitoradmin-1.0.2.jar monitoradmin-1.0.2.jar]

Sources download: [http://osgilab.googlecode.com/files/monitoradmin-1.0.2-sources.jar monitoradmin-1.0.2-sources.jar]

Sources browse: [http://code.google.com/p/osgilab/source/browse/tags/monitoradmin-1.0.2 Here]

Maven Artifact:
{{{
<dependency>
    <groupId>org.knowhowlab.osgi</groupId>
    <artifactId>monitoradmin</artifactId>
    <version>1.0.2</version>
</dependency>
}}}

== Changes == 
*1.0.2*
  * change POM packaging to JAR
  * embed org.osgi.service.monitor package
  * refactor package to org.knowhowlab.osgi.monitoradmin
  * change groupId to org.knowhowlab.osgi
  * change license to Apache License 2.0
  * add support of security permissions
  * add local permissions file

*1.0.1*
  * recompile with J2SE5 
  * use OSGi specification 4.1.0 dependencies

*1.0.0*
Implemented functionality:
  * String getDescription(String path)
  * String[] getMonitorableNames()
  * MonitoringJob[] getRunningJobs() 
  * StatusVariable getStatusVariable(String path) 
  * String[] getStatusVariableNames(String monitorableId) 
  * StatusVariable[] getStatusVariables(String monitorableId) 
  * boolean resetStatusVariable(String path) 
  * MonitoringJob startJob(String initiator, String[] statusVariables, int count) 
  * MonitoringJob startScheduledJob(String initiator, String[] statusVariables, int schedule, int count) 
  * void switchEvents(String path, boolean on) 
  * StatusVariable notification events

Not implemented functionality:
  * Remote Jobs
  * Device Management Tree support

== Dependencies ==
  * OSGi EventAdmin Service
  * OSGi LogService

== Logging ==
  * OSGi LogService if available, otherwise - java.util.logging
